Food Villa

Food Villa App Food Villa is a user-friendly food delivery and restaurant website. Browse menus, order meals, and explore restaurants effortlessly. With real-time data from Swiggy API, Food Villa ensures convenience and satisfaction, making it your go-to choice for culinary delights.

Project Class Allotment

The Class Allotment System is a web-based project designed to streamline the process of assigning classes, faculty, and students efficiently. It eliminates the manual workload and reduces errors in class scheduling or resource allocation.
